translation: Northern Liang Tianzhushu Sanzang translated by Dharmakṣema

translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，一音說法，或有眾生學聲聞乘，聞佛說法，
translation: Having attained unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, I teach the Dharma in one voice. Some sentient beings who study the vehicle of the disciples hear the Buddha’s teaching.

source_sentence: 即得知聲聞法藏；
translation: That is, they will know the treasury of the teachings of the disciples.

source_sentence: 或有修學辟支佛乘，聞佛說法，便得解於辟支佛法；
translation: “Some people who practice the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching will be able to understand the doctrine of the pratyekabuddhas.

source_sentence: 或有修學無上大乘，聞佛說法，便得解了大乘之法純一無雜；
translation: Some people who practice the unsurpassed Great Vehicle and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching will be able to understand that the teachings of the Great Vehicle are all one, unadulterated.

source_sentence: 若有修集助菩提法欲得菩提，聞佛說法，即得捨財，行於布施；
translation: If there is anyone who practices and accumulates the factors conducive to enlightenment and wants to attain enlightenment, and hears the Buddha expound the Teaching, he obtains wealth and practices giving.

source_sentence: 若有眾生離諸功德，悕求天上、人中快樂，聞佛說法，即得持戒；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who, separated from all virtues, earnestly seek happiness in heaven or among humans, and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain discipline.

source_sentence: 若有眾生互相怖畏，有愛瞋心，聞佛說法，即得相於生親厚心；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who fear each other and have feelings of love and hatred, and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain characteristics that engender affection toward them.

source_sentence: 若有眾生憙為殺業，聞佛說法，即得悲心；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who commit the sin of killing and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain compassion.

source_sentence: 若有眾生常為慳悋、嫉妬覆心，聞佛說法，即修喜心；
translation: “Furthermore, if there are any sentient beings who hear the Buddha’s discourse because their minds are always shrouded by stinginess and jealousy, they will cultivate a joyful state of mind.

source_sentence: 若有眾生端正無病，貪著於色，心生放逸，聞佛說法，即得捨心；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who are handsome and free from disease, addicted to material forms, and whose minds give rise to laxity, they will attain equanimity on hearing the Buddha’s teaching.

source_sentence: 若有眾生婬欲熾盛，其心放逸，聞佛說法，即觀不淨；
translation: If there are sentient beings with intense lust and desire, their minds indulging in self-indulgence, listening to the Buddha’s discourse they immediately perceive impurity.

source_sentence: 若有眾生學大乘者，為掉蓋所覆，聞佛說法，即得身念處法；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who study the Great Vehicle but are hindered by the obscurations of torpor, and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain the state of body-mindfulness.

source_sentence: 若有眾生常自稱讚，能大論議，其智慧明猶如抴電，聞佛說法，即解甚深十二因緣；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who always praise themselves and can hold great discussions, their wisdom and insight like lightning. When they hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they immediately understand the profound twelve reasons.

source_sentence: 若有眾生寡聞少見，自稱能論，聞佛說法，即得不奪不失諸陀羅尼；
translation: If there are any sentient beings with little learning and little vision who claim to be able to debate, and if they hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain concentration spells that are not snatched away or lost.

source_sentence: 若有眾生入邪見山，聞佛說法，即解諸法甚深空門；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who enter the mountain of false views and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will understand the profound gate of emptiness of all things.

source_sentence: 若有眾生諸覺覆心，聞佛說法，即得深解無相法門；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds are hindered by all enlightenment and who hear the Buddha’s discourse, they will attain profound understanding of the signless teaching.

source_sentence: 若有眾生諸不淨願覆蔽其心，聞佛說法，即得深解無作法門；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds are overwhelmed by impure vows who hear the Buddha teach, they will attain profound understanding of the unconstructed teaching.

source_sentence: 若有眾生心不清淨，聞佛說法，心得清淨；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds are not pure, when they hear the Buddha teach the Dharma their minds will be pure.

source_sentence: 若有眾生以多緣覆心，聞佛說法，得解不失菩提心法；
translation: “Furthermore, if there are sentient beings whose minds are overwhelmed by many objects and who hear the Teaching from buddhas, they will attain understanding without losing the determination for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若有眾生瞋恚覆心，聞佛說法，解真實相得受記莂；
translation: “Furthermore, if there are sentient beings whose minds are overwhelmed by anger who hear the Teaching of Buddha and understand its true characteristics, they will be able to receive assurance of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若有眾生依猗覆心，聞佛說法，深解諸法無所依猗；
translation: “Furthermore, if there are sentient beings who hear the Buddha’s exhortation based on a mind imbued with attachment, they will deeply understand that all things have no basis or resting place.

source_sentence: 若有眾生愛染覆心，聞佛說法，疾解諸法無垢清淨；
translation: “Furthermore, if there are sentient beings whose minds are stained by craving and who hear the Buddha’s exhortation, they will quickly understand the unstained purity of all truths.

source_sentence: 若有眾生忘失善心，聞佛說法，深解日光三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who forget their good intentions and hear the Buddha’s discourse, they deeply understand the concentration of sunbeam.

source_sentence: 若有眾生行諸魔業，聞佛說法，速得解了清淨之法；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who practice demonic deeds and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will quickly attain understanding of the pure teaching.

source_sentence: 若有眾生邪論覆心，聞佛說法，即得深解增益正法；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds are hindered by wrong theories and who hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain profound understanding and increase in enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若有眾生煩惱覆心，聞佛說法，即得解了離煩惱法；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds are bound by afflictions who hear the Buddha’s discourse, they will attain understanding of the principle of freedom from afflictions.

source_sentence: 若有眾生行諸惡道，聞佛說法，即得迴反；
translation: If there are any sentient beings in evil ways who hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will be able to turn back and forth.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於大乘法讚說邪法，以為吉妙，聞佛說法，即於邪法生退轉心，
translation: “Furthermore, if there are any sentient beings who praise the teaching of false doctrine in regard to the Mahayana teachings as good or wonderful, and hear the Buddha teach them, they will give rise to retrogressing thoughts about false doc

source_sentence: 而得正解；
translation: Instead they attain right understanding.

source_sentence: 若有菩薩厭於生死，聞佛說法，即於生死心生愛樂；
translation: “If there is a bodhisattva who is disgusted with birth and death but hears the Buddha expound the Teaching, that is to say, he will give rise to affection and pleasure in his mind for birth and death.

source_sentence: 若有眾生不知善地，聞佛說法，即得覺了善地之法；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who do not know the good stages and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain understanding of the teaching of the good stages.

source_sentence: 若有眾生見他為善不生好樂，生於妬嫉，聞佛說法，即得心喜；
translation: “Furthermore, if there are sentient beings who see others as good and do not give rise to delight but become jealous of them, and hear the Buddha’s discourse on enlightenment, they will attain joy in their heart

source_sentence: 若有眾生其心各各共相違反，聞佛說法，即得無閡光明；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds each contradict one another, when they hear the Buddha teach the Dharma they attain unobstructed light.

source_sentence: 若有眾生行諸惡業，聞佛說法，深解惡業所得果報；
translation: If there are sentient beings who do evil deeds and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will deeply understand the results of evil deeds.

source_sentence: 若有眾生怖畏大眾，聞佛說法，深得解了師子相三昧；
translation: “Furthermore, if there are any sentient beings fearful of the great assembly and hearing the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will deeply understand the concentration on the characteristics of a lion.

source_sentence: 若有眾生四魔覆心，聞佛說法，疾得首楞嚴三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds are shrouded by the four devils and who hear the Buddha’s exhortation, they will quickly attain the concentration of śūraṃgama-samādhi.

source_sentence: 若有眾生不見諸佛國土光明，聞佛說法，即得深解種種莊嚴光明三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who do not see the light of the buddha-lands and hear the Teaching from those buddhas, they will attain concentration of profound understanding of the various adornments of light.

source_sentence: 若有眾生有憎愛心，聞佛說法即得捨心；
translation: If there are sentient beings who have hatred and desire, they will attain equanimity when hearing the Buddha’s teaching.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得佛法光明，聞佛說法，即得法幢三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not yet attained the light of buddha-teachings and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain the concentration called ‘法旗三昧’ (Dharma Banner).

source_sentence: 若有眾生離大智慧，聞佛說法，即得法炬三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who, separated from great knowledge and wisdom, hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain the concentration of the torch of truth.

source_sentence: 若有眾生癡闇覆心，聞佛說法，即得日燈光明三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds are shrouded in the darkness of ignorance and who hear the Buddha’s exhortation, they will attain concentration endowed with the light of the lamp of the sun.

source_sentence: 若有眾生口無辯才，聞佛說法，即得種種功德應辯；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have no power of elucidation in their speech but hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain various qualities and be able to eloquently explain.

source_sentence: 若有眾生觀色和合，無有堅固，猶如水沫，聞佛說法，即得那羅延三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who observe the confluence of form and non-existence of firmness, like water bubbles. And hear the Buddha teach the Dharma to them, they will immediately attain concentration called nnarayana.

source_sentence: 若有眾生心亂不定，聞佛說法，即得堅牢決定三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds are disturbed and unsettled, when they hear the Buddha’s discourse they immediately attain firm concentration of certainty.

source_sentence: 若有眾生欲觀佛頂，聞佛說法，即得須彌幢三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who wish to see the top of Buddha’s head and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain concentration called ‘crown of the polar mountain.’ “O great enlightening being!

source_sentence: 若有眾生放捨本願，聞佛說法，即得堅牢三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who give up their original vow and listen to the Buddha’s discourse, they attain firm concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生退失諸通，聞佛說法，即得金剛三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have lost their supernormal powers and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain adamantine concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於菩提場而生疑惑，聞佛說法，即得了達金剛道場；
translation: If there were any sentient beings at the site of enlightenment who had doubts and confusions, and heard the Buddha teach the Dharma, they would have attained the adamantine site of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若有眾生一切法中無厭離心，聞佛說法，即得金剛三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have no disillusionment with any doctrine and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain adamantine concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生不知他心，聞佛說法，即知他心；
translation: If there are sentient beings who do not know the minds of others but hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they know the minds of others.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於諸根中不知利鈍，聞佛說法，即知利鈍；
translation: If there are sentient beings who do not know the sharpness or weakness of their faculties, and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will know the sharpness or weakness of their faculties.

source_sentence: 若有眾生各各種類不相解語，聞佛說法，即得解了音聲三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings, each different in kind, who do not understand the speech of others, and hear the Buddha teaches them, they will attain concentration of understanding sound.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得法身，聞佛說法，即得解了分別諸身；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not yet attained the body of reality and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain understanding and discriminating bodies.

source_sentence: 若有眾生不見佛身，聞佛說法，即得不眴三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who do not see the buddha-body but hear the Buddha’s exhortation, they attain unobstructed concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生分別諸緣，聞佛說法，即得無諍三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who discriminate various conditions and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain unadulterated concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於轉法輪，心生疑惑，聞佛說法，於轉法輪得心清淨；
translation: “Furthermore, if there are sentient beings who have doubts in their minds regarding the teaching of the Teaching and hear the Buddha’s discourse, they will attain mental purity while turning the Teaching.

source_sentence: 若有眾生起無因邪行，聞佛說法，即得法明隨順因緣；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who engage in uncausal wrong conduct and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain understanding of truth by following causes and conditions.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於一佛世界起於常見，聞佛說法，即得善別無量佛土；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who arise in one buddha-world to see and hear the Teaching from that buddha, they will attain goodness differentiating infinite buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未種諸相善根，聞佛說法，即得種種莊嚴三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not planted the roots of goodness characteristics yet hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain various adornments concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生不能善別一切言語，聞佛說法，即得解了分別種種言音三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who cannot skillfully discriminate all words, and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they attain concentration in which they understand and discriminate various sounds of speech.

source_sentence: 若有眾生專心求於一切智慧，聞佛說法，即得無所分別法界三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who concentrate their minds on seeking all knowledge and wisdom, and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they attain undifferentiated concentration of the cosmos of reality.

source_sentence: 若有眾生退轉於法，聞佛說法，即得堅固三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who turn away from the Teaching and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain unshakable concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生不知法界，聞佛說法，即得大智慧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who do not know the realm of reality but hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain great wisdom.

source_sentence: 若有眾生離本誓願，聞佛說法，即得不失三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who, discarding their original vow, hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain concentration without loss.

source_sentence: 若有眾生分別諸道，聞佛說法，即得一道無所分別；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who discriminate paths and hear the Buddha teach, they will attain one path without discrimination.

source_sentence: 若有眾生推求智慧，欲同虛空，聞佛說法，即得無所有三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who seek wisdom and want to be like space, and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain ungraspable concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得具足諸波羅蜜，聞佛說法，即得住於淨波羅蜜；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not attained the perfections and hear the Buddha’s discourse, they will be able to abide in the pure transcendent ways.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得具足四攝之法，聞佛說法，即得妙善攝取三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not yet perfected the four methods of salvation, and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain subtle, skillful absorption.

source_sentence: 若有眾生分別四無量心，聞佛說法，即得平等勤心精進；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who discriminate the four immeasurable states of mind and hear the Buddha’s discourse, they will attain impartial zeal effort.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得具足三十七助菩提法，聞佛說法，即得住不出世三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not perfected the thirty-seven factors conducive to enlightenment, and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain supramundane concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生其心失念及善智慧，聞佛說法，即得大海智印三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds are lacking mindfulness and good wisdom who hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain great oceanic knowledge mudrā concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生其心疑惑，未生法忍，聞佛說法，即得諸法決定三昧，以一法相故；
translation: If there are any sentient beings whose minds have doubts and who do not engender patience regarding the doctrine but hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain concentration of certainty in regard to all doctrines because of one characteristic of

source_sentence: 若有眾生忘所聞法，聞佛說法，即得不失念三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who forget the teaching they have heard and listen to the Buddha’s discourse, they will attain concentration of unwavering mindfulness.

source_sentence: 若有眾生各各說法，不相憙樂，聞佛說法，即得清淨慧眼，無有疑網；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who each expound the Teaching, without deceit or displeasure, and who hear the Teaching of buddhas, they will attain the eye of pure wisdom. They will have no web of doubt.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於三寶中不生信心，聞佛說法，即得功德增長三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who do not give rise to faith in the Three Treasures and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain concentration of increasing virtue and enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若有眾生渴乏法雨，聞佛說法，即得法雨三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings thirsting for the rain of the Teaching and hearing the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain the concentration called ‘drain of the Teaching.’ Those who hear the Buddha teach the Dharma will attain absorption

source_sentence: 若有眾生於三寶中起斷滅見，聞佛說法，即得諸寶莊嚴三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who give rise to the view of annihilation in regard to the Three Treasures and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain concentration Adorned with Jewels.

source_sentence: 若有眾生不作智業，不勤精進，聞佛說法，即得金剛智慧三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who do not perform knowledgeable actions and do not exert themselves energetically, and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain concentration of adamantine wisdom.

source_sentence: 若有眾生為諸煩惱之所繫縛，聞佛說法，即得虛空印三昧；
translation: If any sentient beings are bound by the defilements and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain space-seal concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生計我我所，聞佛說法，即得智印三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who think of self and what belongs to self and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain concentration called ‘seal of knowledge’.

source_sentence: 若有眾生不知如來具足功德，聞佛說法，即得世間解脫三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who do not know the enlightened one’s excellence of virtue, and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain worldly liberation concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於過去世未供養佛，聞佛說法，即得種種神足變化；
translation: If there were any sentient beings in the past who had not honored buddhas and heard the Teaching from those buddhas, they would attain various miraculous powers.

source_sentence: 若有眾生一法界門於未來世無量劫中未得說之，聞佛說法，即得解說一切諸法同一法界；
translation: If any sentient beings have one aspect of the cosmos of reality that they will not be able to expound in future ages, and if they hear Buddha teaches them, they will attain understanding that all things are one and the same as the cosmos of reality

source_sentence: 若有眾生於諸一切修多羅中未得選擇，聞佛說法，即得諸法平等實相三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not yet discriminated among all the scriptures and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain concentration on the equality of all things in their true characteristics.

source_sentence: 若有眾生離六和法，聞佛說法，即得解了諸法三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who, separated from the six harmonious principles, listen to the Buddha’s exhortation, they will attain concentration comprehending all things.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於不可思議解脫法門不勤精進，聞佛說法，於諸通中，即得師子遊戲三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who do not exert effort regarding the teaching of the inconceivable liberation, and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, within all their powers they will attain concentration like a lion’s play.

source_sentence: 若有眾生欲分別入於如來藏，聞佛說法，更不從他聞，即得分別入如來藏；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who want to enter the treasury of enlightenment discriminatingly, and hear the Buddha’s teaching without hearing it from anyone else, they will be able to enter the treasury of enlightenment discriminatingly

source_sentence: 若有眾生於菩薩道不勤精進，聞佛說法，即得智慧，勤行精進；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who do not exert effort in the path of enlightening beings and hear the Buddha’s teaching, they attain wisdom and diligently practice it.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未曾得見本生經，聞佛說法，即得一切在在處處三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have never seen the scriptures of their original birth before and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain concentration everywhere.

source_sentence: 若有眾生行道未竟，聞佛說法，即得受記三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not yet completed the path of enlightenment but hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain meditative absorption.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得具足如來十力，聞佛說法，即得無壞三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not yet perfected the ten powers of buddhahood and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain unshakable concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得具足四無所畏，聞佛說法，即得無盡意三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not attained the four forms of fearlessness yet, and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain inexhaustible mental concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得具足佛不共法，聞佛說法，即得不共法三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not yet perfected the unique qualities of buddhahood, and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain uncommon-dharma concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得具足無愚癡見，聞佛說法，即得願句三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not yet attained perfected the absence of deluded views, and hear the Buddha teach the Dharma, they will attain concentration called ‘samādhi of vows.’ “Furthermore, enlightening being

source_sentence: 若有眾生未覺一切佛法之門，聞佛說法，即得鮮白無垢淨印三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not yet comprehended all aspects of the buddha-dharma, and hear the Buddha expound the Teaching, they will attain concentration on the pure white, undefiled mudrā.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得具足一切智者，聞佛說法，即得善了三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not attained omniscience, when they hear the Buddha teach the Dharma they will attain well-understood concentration.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得成就一切佛事，聞佛說法，即得無量不盡意三昧；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who have not yet accomplished all the buddha-works and hear the Buddha’s discourse, they attain immeasurable concentration of inexhaustible mind.

source_sentence: 如是等眾生，於佛法中各得信解。
translation: Such sentient beings each attain faith and understanding in the Buddha's teaching.

source_sentence: 「『有諸菩薩，其心質直無有諂曲，聞佛說法，即得八萬四千諸法門、八萬四千諸三昧門、七萬五千陀羅尼門。
translation: 'There are bodhisattvas whose minds are straightforward and without flattery who hear the Buddha teach the Dharma and immediately attain 84,000 dharma-gates, 84,000 samādhi-gates, and 75,000 dhāraṇī-gates.

source_sentence: 有無量無邊阿僧祇菩薩摩訶薩修集大乘者，聞是說法，亦得如是無量功德，
translation: “Furthermore, those bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas who practice the great vehicle by means of innumerable, infinite, boundless, and incalculable numbers of bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas hear this discourse and

source_sentence: 安止住於不退轉地。
translation: He abides calmly in the stage of nonretrogression.

source_sentence: 是故諸菩薩摩訶薩，欲得種種莊嚴堅牢故，發不可思議願，增益不可思議知見，
translation: Therefore the great enlightening beings, wishing to attain various adornments of firmness and stability, undertake inconceivable vows and increase inconceivable knowledge and vision.

source_sentence: 以自莊嚴，以三十二相莊嚴故，得八十隨形好，以妙音莊嚴故，隨諸眾生所憙說法，
translation: Because of their self-adornment, because of the adornment of the thirty-two marks, they attain the eighty secondary signs and embellishments; because of the adornment of subtle sound, they teach according to the

source_sentence: 令聞法者滿足知見；
translation: They cause those who hear the Teaching to fulfill knowledge and vision.

source_sentence: 以心莊嚴故，得諸三昧，不生退轉；
translation: Because of the adornment of their minds they attain all concentrations and do not give rise to retrogression.

source_sentence: 以念莊嚴故，不失一切諸陀羅尼；
translation: Because of the adornment of mindfulness, they do not lose all their spells.

source_sentence: 以心莊嚴故，得分別諸法；
translation: Because of the adornment of their minds they are able to discriminate all things.

source_sentence: 以念莊嚴故，得解微塵等義；
translation: Because of the adornment of mindfulness, they attain understanding of such things as atoms.

source_sentence: 以善心莊嚴故，得堅固誓願，牢堅精進，如其所願到於彼岸；
translation: Because of the adornment of their good intentions, they attain firm vows. With firm determination and zeal, they reach the other shore in accord with their wishes.

source_sentence: 以專心莊嚴故，次第過住；
translation: Because they concentrate on the adornment of mind, they abide in succession.

source_sentence: 以布施莊嚴故，於諸所須，悉能放捨；
translation: Because of the adornment of giving, they are able to relinquish whatever they need.

source_sentence: 以持戒莊嚴故，令心善白，清淨無垢；
translation: Because of the adornment of observing precepts they cause their minds to be good and white, pure and undefiled.

source_sentence: 以忍辱莊嚴故，於諸眾生，心無障閡；
translation: Because of the adornment of forbearance, their minds have no obstruction or hindrance in regard to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 以精進莊嚴故，一切佐助，悉得成就；
translation: Because of the adornment of their zeal, they attain enlightenment with all aids.

source_sentence: 以禪定莊嚴故，於一切三昧中得師子遊戲；
translation: Because of their adornment of meditation they attain the lion’s play in all concentrations.

source_sentence: 以智慧莊嚴故，知諸煩惱習；
translation: Because they are adorned by knowledge and wisdom, they know the accumulation of afflictions.

source_sentence: 以慈莊嚴故，專心念於一切眾生；
translation: Because they are adorned with compassion, they concentrate their minds on all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 以悲莊嚴故，悉能拔出眾生之苦；
translation: Because of the adornment of compassion they are able to remove the sufferings of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 以喜莊嚴故，於一切法，心無疑惑；
translation: Because of the adornment of joy, they have no doubt or confusion in their minds about anything.

source_sentence: 以捨莊嚴故，得離憍慢心，心無高下；
translation: Because of giving up adornment, they attain freedom from conceit and pride. Their minds have no high or low level.

source_sentence: 以諸通莊嚴故，於一切法得師子遊戲；
translation: Because of the adornment of their superknowledgements, they attain the lion’s play in all things.

source_sentence: 以功德莊嚴故，得不可盡藏寶手；
translation: Because of their adornments of virtue they obtained inexhaustible hands made of jewels.

source_sentence: 以智莊嚴故，知諸眾生所有諸心；
translation: Because they are adorned by knowledge, they know the minds of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 以意莊嚴故，方便惺悟一切眾生；
translation: Because their minds are adorned, they skillfully awaken all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 以光明莊嚴故，得智慧眼明；
translation: Because of being adorned with light, they attain the eye of knowledge and insight.

source_sentence: 以諸辯莊嚴故，令眾生得法義應辭；
translation: Because they are adorned with eloquence, they cause sentient beings to attain the meaning of truth.

source_sentence: 以無畏莊嚴故，一切諸魔不能留難；
translation: Because they are adorned with fearlessness, all demons cannot harm them.

source_sentence: 以功德莊嚴故，得諸佛世尊所有功德；
translation: Because of their adornment of virtue they attain the virtues of all buddhas and world-honored ones.

source_sentence: 以法莊嚴故，得無閡辯，常為眾生演說妙法；
translation: Because of their adornment of truth they attain unobstructed intelligence, always expounding the Teaching to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 以光明莊嚴故，得一切佛法光明；
translation: Because of their adornments of light, they attain the light of all buddha-teachings.

source_sentence: 以照明莊嚴故，能遍照於諸佛世界；
translation: Because of their adornments of illumination they can illumine all buddha-worlds.

source_sentence: 以他心莊嚴故，得正智無亂；
translation: Because they are adorned by the minds of others, they attain unconfused right knowledge.

source_sentence: 以教誡莊嚴故，得如所說護持禁戒；
translation: Because of the adornment of their instruction and admonition they attain observance of the precepts as taught.

source_sentence: 以神足莊嚴故，得如意足到於彼岸；
translation: Because of the adornment of their spiritual feet, they attain supernormal powers and reach the other shore.

source_sentence: 以受持一切諸如來莊嚴故，得入如來無量法藏；
translation: Because they receive and hold the adornments of all buddhas, they attain entry into the infinite treasury of truth of buddhas.

source_sentence: 以尊法莊嚴故，得不隨他智慧；
translation: Because of the adornment of their honorable teachings they attain knowledge that does not follow others.

source_sentence: 以隨行一切善法莊嚴故，得如說而行，欲令如是眾生悉得如是等功德利益。
translation: Because they follow the adornment of all good qualities, they attain such explanations and practice them, wanting to cause such sentient beings to attain such merits and benefits.

source_sentence: 若有無量無邊阿僧祇菩薩摩訶薩修集大乘，以我說一句法故，悉具如是白淨善法，
translation: “If there are innumerable, boundless, and incalculable great enlightening beings who practice the accumulation of the Great Vehicle, they will all possess such pure and genuine good qualities because I teach them a single phrase of truth.

source_sentence: 皆使充足，以是故，諸菩薩摩訶薩於諸法中所得智慧，不從他聞，得成就大法光明，
translation: Because of this, the great enlightening beings attain knowledge regarding all truths, do not hear from others, and attain the illumination of the great Teaching.

source_sentence: 成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They become unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若眾生於他方世界作五逆罪，乃至犯四重禁，燒滅善法，若學聲聞、緣覺、大乘，
translation: If sentient beings commit the five heinous crimes in other worlds, up to violate the four grave prohibitions and burn down good qualities, or if they train as śrāvakas, pratyekbuddhas, or great vehicle bodhisattvas,

source_sentence: 以願力故，欲來生我世界，既來生已，復取一切諸不善業，麤朴弊惡，
translation: Because of the power of their vow, they want to be born in my world. Having been born there, they will again take up all unwholesome actions, coarse and ugly,

source_sentence: 其心憙求強梁難調，專以四倒貪著慳悋。
translation: Their minds are coarse and difficult to regulate, and they exclusively cling to the four kinds of mistaken craving and stinginess with the four faults.

source_sentence: 如是等眾生，八萬四千異性亂心，我當為其各各異性，廣說八萬四千法聚。
translation: Such sentient beings have eighty-four thousand different natures that disturb their minds, and I will explain in detail the eighty-four thousand dharmas for each of them with their different natures.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有眾生學無上大乘，我當為其具足廣說六波羅蜜，所謂檀波羅蜜，乃至般若波羅蜜。
translation: If there are sentient beings who study the unsurpassed great vehicle, I will fully explain the six perfections in detail for them, which are called the perfection of giving and even the perfection of wisdom.

source_sentence: 若有眾生學聲聞乘未種善根，願求諸佛以為其師，我當安止於三歸依，
translation: If there are any sentient beings who study the vehicle of the śrāvakas but have not yet planted roots of goodness, may they ask the buddhas to be their teachers. I will establish them in the three refuges:

source_sentence: 然後勸令住六波羅蜜。
translation: He then encourages them to abide in the six perfections.

source_sentence: 若有眾生憙為殺害，我當安止於不殺中。
translation: If there are sentient beings who commit sexual misconduct and kill, I'll be comfortable in not killing them.

source_sentence: 若有眾生專行惡貪，我當安住於不盜中。
translation: If there are sentient beings who exclusively practice bad craving, I will abide in the state of not stealing.

source_sentence: 若有眾生非法邪婬，我當安止不邪婬中。
translation: If there are sentient beings who engage in unlawful sexual misconduct, I will place them safely among those who aren't.

source_sentence: 若有眾生各各故作誹謗妄語，我當安止不妄語中。
translation: If there are sentient beings who each deliberately denigrate false speech, I will be settled among those who don't speak falsely.

source_sentence: 若有眾生樂為狂癡，我當安止不飲酒中。
translation: If there are sentient beings who happily become crazy, I will be comfortable and won't drink alcohol.

source_sentence: 若有眾生犯此五事，我當令受優婆塞五戒。
translation: If there are sentient beings who violate these five things, I will cause them to receive the five precepts for laymen.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於諸善法不生憙樂，我當令其一日一夜受持八戒。
translation: If there are sentient beings who don't give rise to anger and happiness in good qualities, I will cause them to observe the eight precepts for one day and night.

source_sentence: 若有眾生少於善根，於善根中心生愛樂，我當令其於未來世，在佛法中出家學道，
translation: If there are any sentient beings who lack the roots of goodness and give rise to affection for those roots of goodness, I will cause them in the future to leave home and study the path in the company of buddhas.

source_sentence: 安止令住梵淨十戒。
translation: He establishes and causes them to abide in the ten pure precepts of Brahmā.

source_sentence: 若有眾生悕心求於諸善根法，我當安止善根法中，令得成就梵行具足大戒。
translation: If there are sentient beings who earnestly seek the teaching of the good roots, I will establish them in the teaching of the good roots so that they can accomplish the religious practice and fulfill the great precepts.

source_sentence: 如是等眾生，作五逆罪，乃至慳悋，為是眾生，以種種門，示現神足，
translation: Such sentient beings commit the five heinous sins, up to stinginess. For these sentient beings they manifest their supernormal powers in various ways:

source_sentence: 說諸句義，開示陰、界、諸入、苦、空、無常、無我，令住善妙安隱寂滅無畏涅槃，
translation: He teaches the meaning of all phrases, revealing the aggregates, elements, and sense-fields, suffering, emptiness, impermanence, and selflessness, enabling them to abide in well-being, peace, tranquility

source_sentence: 為如是四眾比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷說法。
translation: He teaches the Dharma for these four groups of monks, bhikṣuṇīs, laymen, and laywomen.

source_sentence: 若有眾生求聞論議，我當說正法論，乃至有求解脫之者，我當為說空無之論。
translation: If there are any sentient beings who seek to hear the discussion, I will explain the theory of the right teaching, and if there are those who seek liberation, I will explain the theory of emptiness and nonexistence for them.

source_sentence: 若有眾生其心不樂於正善法，我當為說營作眾事。
translation: If there are sentient beings whose minds don't delight in the right and good Dharma, I will explain how to do various things for them.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於正善法其心愛樂，我當為說空三昧定示正解脫。
translation: If there are sentient beings who delight in the right and good Dharma, I will explain for them the concentration of emptiness samādhi to show their right liberation.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我為如是一一眾生，要當過於百千由旬不以神足，而以開示無量無邊種種方便，
translation: For the sake of each and every sentient being like this I will go beyond a hundred thousand yojanas without using my supernormal powers to show them measureless, limitless, and various methods.

source_sentence: 為解句義，示現神足，乃至涅槃，心不生厭。
translation: In order to understand the meaning of the words, they show their miraculous abilities and even attain nirvāṇa without aversion in their minds.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我以三昧力故，捨第五分所得壽命而般涅槃，我於是時，自分其身如半葶藶子，
translation: Because of the power of samādhi, I gave up the fifth part of my former existence and entered nirvana. At that moment, having renounced it, I separated myself like a half-empty lotus blossom in my body

source_sentence: 為憐愍眾生故，求般涅槃。
translation: For the sake of pitying sentient beings, they seek parinirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 般涅槃後，所有正法住世千歲，像法住世滿五百歲。
translation: After parinirvāṇa, all the right teachings will abide in the world for a thousand years, and those who follow the Dharma will abide in the world for 500 years.

source_sentence: 我涅槃後，若有眾生，以珍寶、伎樂供養舍利，乃至禮拜、右繞一匝，
translation: “After my nirvana, if there are any sentient beings who make offerings of rare treasures and music to the relics, even one-sidedly circumambulate them once or twice.

source_sentence: 合掌稱歎、一莖華散，以是因緣隨其志願，於三乘中各不退轉。
translation: They joined their palms and praised it, and a single stalk of flowers scattered, so for this reason they followed their vows and didn't retreat in each of the three vehicles.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我般涅槃後，若有眾生於我法中，乃至一戒，如我所說能堅持之，乃至讀誦一四句偈為他人說，
translation: “After my parinirvana, if there are any sentient beings who adhere to one precept or another of the ten precepts in relation to my doctrine, just as I have taught them, they will be able to uphold these precepts

source_sentence: 令彼聽者心生歡喜，供養法師，乃至一華一禮，以是因緣，隨其志願於三乘中各不退轉，
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, they follow their aspirations without turning back among the three vehicles according to their wishes.

source_sentence: 乃至法炬滅、法幢倒。
translation: It's even when the torch of the Dharma ceases and the banner of the Dharma is overturned.

source_sentence: 正法滅已，我之舍利尋沒於地至金剛際，爾時娑婆世界空無珍寶，我之舍利變為意相琉璃寶珠，
translation: When the true teaching had ceased, my relics disappeared from the earth to the limit of the adamantine realm. At that time the sahā world was empty and lacking precious treasures. My relics became mental images made of lapis lazuli

source_sentence: 其明焰盛從金剛際出於世間，上至阿迦尼吒天，雨種種華曼陀羅華、摩訶曼陀羅華、波利質多華、曼殊沙華、摩訶曼殊沙華，
translation: The blazing flame of that light came out of the world from the realm of the diamond and ascended up to the Akaniṣṭha gods, showering various kinds of flowers like maṇḍala flowers, mahāmandārava flowers, pāri

source_sentence: 有淨光明大如車輪，百葉、千葉，或百千葉，或百千華，其光遍照。
translation: It had a pure light the size of a carriage wheel, with a hundred leaves or a thousand leaves, or a hundred thousand leaves or a hundred thousand flowers shining everywhere.

source_sentence: 復有好香微妙常敷，觀者無厭。
translation: Again, there's a good fragrance and subtlety that always spreads out, and those who observe it don't tire of it.

source_sentence: 其明焰盛不可稱計，微妙之香無量無邊，純雨如是無量諸華。
translation: Its bright flame is so great that it can't be measured, and its subtle fragrance is immeasurable and limitless, purely raining flowers like these innumerable flowers.

source_sentence: 當其雨時，復出種種微妙音聲，佛聲、法聲、比丘僧聲、三歸依聲、優婆塞戒聲、成就八戒聲、出家十戒聲、布施聲、持戒聲、清淨梵行具大戒聲、佐助眾事聲、讀經聲、禪思惟聲、觀不淨聲、念出入息聲、非想非非想聲、有想無想聲、識處聲、空處聲、八勝處聲、十一切入聲、定慧聲、空聲、無相聲、無作聲、十二因緣聲、具足聲聞藏聲、學緣覺聲、具足大乘六波羅蜜聲，
translation: When it rained, various subtle sounds also emerged: the sound of buddhas, the sound of the Dharma, the sound of monks and nuns, the sound of the three refuges, the sound of laymen’s precepts, the sound of

source_sentence: 於其華中出如是等聲，色界諸天皆悉聞之，本昔所作諸善根本，各自憶念，
translation: The gods of the realm of form all heard these sounds, remembering the roots of virtue they had done in the past.

source_sentence: 所有不善尋自悔責，即便來下娑婆世界，教化世間無量眾生，悉令得住於十善中。
translation: All the unwholesome sentient beings who repent of their sins, they even come down to the sahā world and teach measureless sentient beings in the world so that they can all abide in the ten good qualities.

source_sentence: 欲界諸天亦得聞受，所有愛結貪喜五欲，諸心數法悉得寂靜，本昔所作諸善根本，
translation: The gods of the realm of desire can also hear and receive it. All the fetters of craving, all the fetters of greed, and all the five fetters of delight in objects of sensual pleasure are appeased by these mental states

source_sentence: 各自憶念，所有不善尋自悔責，即便來下娑婆世界，教化世間無量眾生，
translation: Each of them remembered his own unwholesomeness and repented, so they came down to the sahā world to teach measureless sentient beings in the world.

source_sentence: 悉令得住於十善中。
translation: They all allow them to abide in the ten good qualities.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是諸華於虛空中，復當化作種種珍寶，金銀、摩尼、真珠、琉璃、珂貝、璧玉、真寶、偽寶、馬瑙、珊瑚、天冠、寶飾，
translation: In the sky, these flowers will also be adorned with various treasures: gold, silver, maṇi, genuine pearls, lapis lazuli, shellfish, crystal, real treasures, fake treasures, agate, coral, celesti

source_sentence: 如雨而下，一切遍滿娑婆世界。
translation: Like rain falling down, everything pervades the sahā world.

source_sentence: 爾時，人民其心和悅，無諸鬪諍、飢餓、疾病，他方怨賊、惡口諸毒，
translation: At that time, the people’s minds were peaceful and happy. There was no fighting, hunger or sickness, and there were no enemies or thieves from other directions, harsh words, or poisons.

source_sentence: 一切消滅皆得寂靜。
translation: All things that cease will all attain quiescence.

source_sentence: 爾時，世界有如是樂，若有眾生見諸珍寶，若觸若用，於三乘中無有退轉。
translation: At the time, the world had such happiness that if sentient beings saw treasures, touched them or used them, there wouldn't be any retrogression in the three vehicles.
